PipelineMappingQC.py - common tasks for QC’ing mapping¶

Author:Andreas Heger
Release:$Id$
Date:April 02, 2014
Tags:Python

Purpose¶

Usage¶

Type:

python <script_name>.py --help

for command line help.

Code¶

PipelineMappingQC.getNumReadsFromReadsFile(infile)¶

get number of reads from a .nreads file.

PipelineMappingQC.getNumReadsFromBAMFile(infile)¶

count number of reads in bam file.

PipelineMappingQC.buildPicardInsertSizeStats(infile, outfile, genome_file)¶

gather BAM file insert size statistics using Picard

PipelineMappingQC.buildPicardAlignmentStats(infile, outfile, genome_file)¶

gather BAM file alignment statistics using Picard

PipelineMappingQC.buildPicardDuplicationStats(infile, outfile)¶

Record duplicate metrics using Picard, the marked records are discarded

PipelineMappingQC.buildPicardDuplicateStats(infile, outfile)¶

Record duplicate metrics using Picard and keep the dedupped .bam file

PipelineMappingQC.buildPicardGCStats(infile, outfile, genome_file)¶

Gather BAM file GC bias stats using Picard

PipelineMappingQC.loadPicardMetrics(infiles, outfile, suffix, pipeline_suffix='.picard_stats', tablename=False)¶

load picard metrics.

PipelineMappingQC.loadPicardHistogram(infiles, outfile, suffix, column, pipeline_suffix='.picard_stats', tablename=False)¶

extract a histogram from a picard output file and load it into database.

PipelineMappingQC.loadPicardAlignmentStats(infiles, outfile)¶

load all output from Picard’s CollectMultipleMetrics into sql database.

PipelineMappingQC.loadPicardDuplicationStats(infiles, outfiles)¶

load picard duplicate filtering stats.

PipelineMappingQC.loadPicardDuplicateStats(infiles, outfile, pipeline_suffix='.bam')¶

load picard duplicate filtering stats.

PipelineMappingQC.buildBAMStats(infile, outfile)¶

Count number of reads mapped, duplicates, etc.

PipelineMappingQC.loadBAMStats(infiles, outfile)¶

load bam2stats.py output into sqlite database.
